header.about:
As a passionate Software Crafter, I have extensive experience in developing robust and scalable web applications. My technical expertise spans from frontend development using modern frameworks like Nuxt and Angular to backend development with languages such as Java, Python, and Ruby on Rails. With a solid understanding of database design and management, including SQL and NoSQL, I am capable of crafting holistic solutions.

My goal is to create innovative software solutions that help businesses stay competitive and achieve their objectives. If you are in search of a Full Stack Engineer, I am at your service.

ioer_monitor.intro: The IÖR-Monitor is a web GIS to intuitively answer questions about land use in Germany.

climbing_diary.intro: Virtual diary with statistical analysis of personal performance, as a native Android App.

monitor_api.intro: REST API for geodata processing within the Sora-research project with user management.

land_use_monitor.intro: It provides information on the area structure and its development, as well as comprehensive data on the quality across Germany, as a app.
